channel.title: {req} side bar
channel.description:
Hey you graphic makers!
I need a side bar for my site if any one is up for the challenge.
there are no size requirments, just what ever you think is the respectable size for a column/side bar
at the top of the side bar I need the words "Islam Wave" in kind of a bold or big font. Maybe underlined (whatever flows)
and the links are in order as shown:
Home Quran Recitation Adhan Nasheeds Special Recordings
the colors are black and blue and I need there to be a border around the column/sidebar
ask any more questions if you need
and please tell me all fonts you used incase I need to add any more links/words.

item.title: {req} side bar
item.dc:creator: @Jens Jens
item.description:
@Jens wrote:

Every picture has a different word in the menu underlined.

Read full topic

item.title: {req} side bar
item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

KyleGut3:

Mmk. Heres something I put together pretty quickly.

Main : http://img126.imageshack.us/img126/6843/islamwavenav9rn.jpg
RollH : http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/295/islamwavenavh9ja.jpg
RollQ : http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/8620/islamwavenavq2vv.jpg
RollH : http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/6456/islamwavenava1hq.jpg
RollN : http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/8316/islamwavenavn9gz.jpg
RollS : http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/9083/islamwavenavs8xg.jpg

the rollovers aren't that great, but.. they should work alright. Just go through my newly typed tutorial here and get em to work :D.

I like it. But I dont get the concept of rollovers( I dont know what they are). Because they all look the same to me.

oh and good job spelling recitation

Read full topic
